items.title: Regional-bank stocks are catching up to larger rivals. How to play the sector from here.
items.description: A KBW analyst still prefers big banks over regional names, but sees opportunities for investors who want to chase the rally in smaller bank stocks.

items.title: I’m getting a $100K personal-injury settlement. Will my estranged wife get any of it?
items.description: “After we were hit by two major hurricanes, my wife secretly kept the disaster-recovery assistance money.”

items.title: Trump’s effort to oust Fed’s Lisa Cook looks likely to run into legal roadblocks
items.description: President Donald Trump announced late Monday that he had fired Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook — but it’s not clear that he can.

items.title: This healthcare benefit provides a triple tax advantage — but many employees don’t use it
items.description: Health Savings Accounts combine federal tax-deductible contributions with tax-free growth and tax-free medical withdrawals.

items.title: The small-cap rally is real. Here are five stocks to consider owning right now.
items.description: Why small caps just might be the stock market’s new “Magnificent Seven.”
